description: Upon realization of the information disclosure issue linked to Microsoft Message Queuing, users could experience unexpected sharing of sensitive information. This occurs as an attacker may successfully exploit the vulnerability to read small portions of heap memory, leading to potential exposure of confidential data. System administrators might notice unusual patterns of data access or reports of unauthorized data visibility after the deployment of affected updates. The vulnerability affects multiple Windows builds including version 10, 0, 19044, 3930, and others, associated with updates such as KB-5034134 and KB-5034123. Immediate attention is recommended to patch these critical updates to mitigate unauthorized access risks and safeguard user data integrity.
